docs.text: Welcome to the homepage of Weitian Xing I am currently a 1st-term MASc(Master of Applied Science) student in the department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at University of Waterloo , my advisor is Prof. Werner Dietl . Before that, I received my B.S. in Electronic Information Science and Technology from Nanjing University of Posts and Telecommunications . My Chinese name is 邢维天(Xing Weitian). Click here to hear the pronunciation of my first name. Or, you can simply call me "Wei". Find me at: Github Research Interest I am currently working on pluggable type systems. Industry Experience From April to June 2018, I interned at Nanjing Guiji Zhineng Technology Co., Ltd. as a Python R&D Engineer. From October 2017 to January 2018, I interned at Nanjing Walkyren Network Technology Co., Ltd. as a Backend Developer. Contact Me Click here to see the contact information.
